title: Help identifying Sans Serif
content:
Hi all,

can anyone help identify this?

[http://www.andygoldman.com/projects\_type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419115318/http:/www.andygoldman.com/projects_type.jpg "http://www.andygoldman.com/projects\_type.jpg")

thanks!
author: andy goldman

comments.content: Looks like Gotham Light from H&FJ

Or possibly even Gotham Rounded Light.

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100030](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419115318/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100030 "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100030")
You nailed it! Thanks so much.
